For Law 13-107, see notes following ยง 34-1501.

DC CODE ยง 34-1503

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Competitive billing shall begin on the initial implementation date and shall be implemented according to a schedule to be determined by the Commission. The Commission shall have the discretion to implement competitive billing for all customers on a single date.
This section shall not preclude the Commission from including competitive billing as a part of any pilot program established by the Commission.

chapter.text: Retail Electric Competition and Consumer Protection.
